content: That sounds amazing! I'll definitely check out those neighborhoods and markets. I'm also interested in learning more about the history and culture of both countries. In Cancun, I visited the ancient Mayan ruins of Chichen Itza, which was breathtaking. Our guide, Carlos, was super knowledgeable and shared a lot of interesting facts about the history and architecture of the site. I'm hoping to find similar historical and cultural experiences in NZ and Australia.
